about_the_game:
Give your male NPCs time to shine with NPC Male Adventurers Vol.1! TK.Projects has made a companion pack to their female adventurers pack, this time giving voices to 12 different men you’re likely to find in the local adventurer’s guild! Chat with other adventurers, pick up new quests from a sleepy receptionist, practice your skills against the beast of a guildmaster, and try to avoid the town drunkard, each with their own SEs thanks to this pack.

Features:

* 120 different phrases and sayings
* 12 characters, 10 SE per character
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
